ing: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a topping for a Pineapple Party cake and I believe could be used for a filling also."
ins: In a large bowl, combine pudding mix and milk. Beat until smooth. Blend in cream cheese. Fold in the whipped topping, then fold in the crushed pineapple.
